reviews.comments: Great, clean place. Central and safe Location, quick Access to public Transport.

Very nice and clean apartment. Perfect location near to metro and s-barn We stayed 5 people with no trouble. Easy to communicate with Alex. Easy key delivery.  The only thing is you never got the feeling that you are staying in someones home. And if you want to cook by yourself it's not The best kitchen facilities.

Alex was very easy to communicate with and his apartment was clean and looks just as pictured online. If you are looking for a nice no-frills place to stay this is place is perfect. My favorite amenity are the incredible black-out shutter, which are great for sleeping in after enjoying Berlin's famous late night scene. Also, it is only a block to the nearest U-bahn station so it is easy to get around town. Highly recommend.
Alex was a great host... it was easy and flexible checking in and he even received mail and held it for us on our behalf. would definitely recommend him to any other travellers

Alex's place was great! Me and 5 others stayed here for 5 days, the apartment was just as described, plenty spacious and in a perfect location to get around the city easily being right next to a subway station! Alex as a host was fantastic answering all questions we had before and after we had arrived! Highly recommend staying here!
Good apt. We enjoyed
We felt very welcome in Alex's apartment.  All the facilities worked really well.  The apartment is very central, comfortable and easy to use.  We really enjoyed our stay.

Very clear instructions on where to find the key.
Very spacious apartment for 3 persons.
cery clean and good location (just 2 minutes from the subway).
The flat was convenient and has an an excellent location. Alex was very helpful.
The house is very nice and clean. My friends and I love this house even we just stay one night here.
All went so smooth. Keys easy to find, the appartment in a silent street. Two separate bedrooms (one with seating), fully equipped kitchen. Close to U-bahn. I can only recommend :)

The flat was very clean and cozy, totally like on photos. The district is very nice, with many cafes, shops and 3 metro-stations in 5 minutes of walk or less ( one of them is a train station, but it is combined with metro).
The atmosphere here was wonderful.
Alex is polite and friendly person, our check-in and check-out were very comfortable for us.

The space was clean and well appointed and in a great location.
Everything was fine.

Although we didn't meet Alex in person, he made sure in every way we were welcomed. Getting the key was straightforward and easy. The flat is nice and spacious. Everything was very clean and we could easily find everything we needed. The area is nice and finding a parking spot was easy enough for Berlin. The apartment is very easily accessible by public transport. I would definitely recommend this apartment for anyone looking to spend a few days in Berlin.

The apartment is great and has everything you could need. It is lovely and warm, a really good size and has nice comfortable beds. The rooms are furnished well, slightly quirky and all a but mismatched but we really liked that about it, it gave it character. The large art work on the walls is a real talking point! Alex as a host is great. We called him as we arrived and he answered straight away, his clear directions helped us find the flat quickly. We messaged Alex late one night to ask if he could help us when our friend lost her phone, as there was a language barrier between us and the person who had found it. He messaged us back first thing in the morning and was extremely helpful!! We got the phone back thanks to Alex. Great stay, would definitely recommend renting an apartment off him! Thanks again

I arrived very late and so Alex wasn't able to stay to meet me in person, he left very clear instructions on where to find the key. Alex also left a handy map of Berlin which was an absolute life saver. The flat itself was very spacious - I stayed there with my sister, niece and nephew and there was more than enough space for the kids to run around. The location is great,  literally 2 minutes away from the station  and centrally located. It made my stay in Berlin a lot more enjoyable and I would recommend staying here!
Alex's place was neat, clean and spacious. the toilet was very clean as well. overall, a nice place to stay in! close to metro.

Our stay at Alex's apartment was fantastic! The flat is big, clean, has everything that is necessary for pleasant stay! We can surely recommend this apartment! Though we didn't meet Alex in person, we could call him when we needed help and was willing to help us.

We have not met Alex but he was always available to reply to our request. The appartement was perfect, very close to public transport and all kind of shops and supermarket! We are already thinking about reserve the same flat for the next Berlinale! Thank you a lot Alex!

The place was as described, really nice and spacious, and clean.
Communicating with Alex was also very easy.
the apartment is comfortable, better than the pictures and very good location and you need to have a good stay in Berlin

The apartment was in a convenient location, near the U-bahn station. Alex responded very promptly and provided thorough instructions on key pick up even though he was out of town. The apartment is just like in the pictures. The only minor downside was the two large pictures on the walls which were found creepy by the female part of our company.

Apartment is on very nice and quiet street, with perfect Italian restorant two buildings away :)
Apartment was clean and nice.
Alext is very friendly and fast responding:)
Alex was fast in his responses and professional. The apartment was clean and even more spacious than on pictures (!). Close to well-served metro station, great location to stay!
Alex was a great host. Great location and the directions to the apartment are clear and precise. The apartment was just as it looked in the picture, everything is clean and tidy.

We had the best time in Berlin.  The apartment was close to both the U-Bahn and S-Bahn which made it extremely easy to get around the city.  Several markets are within a few minutes from the apartment and an excellent Italian restaurant is a few doors down.  The apartment was very clean with a well equipped kitchen. Plenty of room for several people or a small family.  Just to note, the apartment is on the ground floor and you can hear the street noise but it was not so loud that it interrupted our sleep. Alex made it very easy to obtain the keys and was available for the one question we had.  I would recommend Alex and his apartment any day!  Thank you!
big flat, wonderful location and stylish decorated. And plus delivery of the keys was fascinating :) And reaally cheap!
Alex made the place very welcoming, he was great at communication and we had no problems at all!
Our host was always ready to help. Kitchen is very well equipped. Thanks Alex!
L'appartement est grand, propre et bien situé, à deux minutes du métro. La communication est très facile avec Alex. Tout s'est déroulé parfaitement !
Tb pour 5 personnes. Logement propre et dans une rue calme à 1 mn à pied du métro. Le marché du samedi est juste au bout de la rue, fruits et légumes à prix défiant toute concurrence !
Wir hatten eine gute Zeit, die Wohnung war sehr sauber und gross! Die Schlüsselübergabe funktionierte reibungslos und Alex jeweils sofort geantwortet!
delizioso appartamento, in un quartiere tranquillo e ben servito
Un appartement très bien situé, Alex nous a bien renseigné et nous étions ravis de notre séjour.

Alles lief problemlos und die Wohnung ist wie beschrieben und auf den Bildern gezeigt. Wir waren dort zu sechst (4 Erwachsene und 2 Kinder) und war ausreichend Platz, die Wohnung war größer als erwartet. Die Lage ist sehr gut, U-Bahn ist 3min zu Fuß entfernt, S-Bahn 5min. Busse fahren auch um die Ecke (z.B. direkt zum HBF). In der selben Straße ist ein sehr guter Italiener, sehr empfehlenswert!
Insgesamt eine gute Wohnung und eine sehr positive Erfahrung, wir würden für den nächsten Berlinbesuch wieder kommen.

Muy buena locación, excelente transporte un barrio bien comunicado, con buenos supermercados, tiendas de bebidas y un excelente bar en la esquina El departamento estaba limpio y en buenas condiciones. No conocí a Alex, pero estuvimos siempre comunicados. Fue muy fácil encontrar las llaves en la caja de seguridad. Recomiendo este lugar.

Alex' Wohnung liegt super zentral und bietet alles, was man für einen Aufenthalt in Berlin braucht. Die Wohnung ist größer, als sie auf den Fotos erscheint. Schlüsselübergabe und Kommunikation liefen reibungslos, Alex war immer erreichbar. Wir kommen gerne wieder!

Non saprei dare un giurizio su Alex e sull'accoglienza, dato che non c'è stata. Non l'ho mai visto perché mi ha lasciato le chiavi vicino alla sua bicicletta. In ogni caso l'appartamento era pulito e come da foto. Il quartiere, che già conoscevo, tranquillo e ben servito.

Die Lage der Wohnung ist grossartig (S-Bahnhof und U-Bahn gleich um die Ecke). Die Schlüsselübergabe war einfach und flexibel. Die Wohnung ist grösser als sie im Inserat scheint, das hat uns positiv überrascht. Die Bettwäsche war bereits angezogen und die Handtücher waren ebenfalls vorhanden. Die Wohnung war sauber und hübsch eingerichtet (entspricht genau den Fotos).
Wir haben den Aufenthalt genossen und können die Wohnung sehr weiterempfehlen!

Perfekte Beschreibung, Alex selbst war nicht da, der Schlüssel war aber in der Nachbarschaft hinterlegt, das Apartment (interessante Fotografien an den Wänden) war sauber, ordentlich und es war alles da. Perfekte Wohnung, öffentlicher Nahverkehr gut erreichbar, ruhige Gegend und alle Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gut erreichbar. Empfehlenswert für einen Berlinbesuch.....
El apartamento cerca de los lugares más turísticos.Muy cerca de la parada del metro. El baño muy limpio y barrio tranquilo.Genial:)
Wir hatten einen sehr schönen Aufenthalt in Alex' Wohnung. Die Schlüsselübergabe hat gut funktioniert und die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und gut eingerichtet. Jederzeit kommen wir gerne wieder.
Hatten ein schönes Wochenende in Alex Apartment. Wohnung war wie beschrieben - die Übergabe hat reibungslos geklappt.

La estancia fue muy bien, la casa cumple con todo lo que prometía el propietario, un barrio bastante accesible gracias a bus y metro, estuvimos 4 días sin ningún problema, había un poquito de ruido  de la calle alguna vez pero no molestaba nada.
Sehr angenähme, saubere und schöne wohnung. Zentrale platzierung. Alex ist zuverlässig und hilfsbereit. 5/5

Het appartement was enorm groot. Ruime slaapkamers en de keuken was van alle gemakken voorzien. Super schoon ook! Het metrostation lag in de straat en je zit ook super centraal. Echt een aanrader als je goedkoop een paar dagen in Berlijn wilt verblijven.

Ik heb Alex niet ontmoet helaas maar het contact was goed. Hij reageert snel en maakt duidelijke afspraken. Zijn appartement was precies zoals beschreven en het was prima voor het weekend. We zaten er met z'n zessen en het is daar zeker groot genoeg voor. Locatie is overigens prima omdat je snel bij een openbaar vervoer station bent.
genau wie geschrieben, alles sehr gut organisiert, top lage
